snippet: The Affordable Care Act will greatly affect health care costs in the next decade and beyond, but in what ways is still unclear.
abstract: Editorial contends latest federal estimates of health care spending show that spending is expected to rise faster than growth in economy over next 10 years; raises question of what role Affordable Care Act has played and will play in prodding health care system to adopt more efficient practices.
lead_paragraph: The Affordable Care Act will greatly affect health care costs in the next decade and beyond, but in what ways is still unclear.

headline.main: The Ebb and Flow of Health Spending
headline.print_headline: The Ebb and Flow of Health Spending
